1088197.shortDescription: This Acrobatic class blends athletic tumbling skills with dance technique—students will work on strength, balance, flexibility and fluid transitions between dance and acro moves in a supportive environment.

1088223.shortDescription: Introduces young children to movement, music and basic ballet positions in a joyful, nurturing setting while building coordination and confidence.

1101833.shortDescription: A foundational classical ballet technique, focusing on posture, alignment, barre work and beginning jumps and turns to develop a strong base for all dance styles.

1122064.shortDescription: A foundational classical ballet technique, focusing on posture, alignment, barre work and beginning jumps and turns to develop a strong base for all dance styles.

1088190.shortDescription: Builds on foundational technique with more complex jumps, turns and combinations while emphasizing artistry, musicality and disciplined movement.

1088184.shortDescription: Enhances technical proficiency with advanced barre and center work, increased allegro and adagio, and greater performance quality as students prepare for serious training.

1101829.shortDescription: Enhances technical proficiency with advanced barre and center work, increased allegro and adagio, and greater performance quality as students prepare for serious training.

1088031.shortDescription: This lively combined class where dancers explore both classical ballet and rhythmic tap—learning ballet positions, tap technique and simple routines in a fun introductory format.

1088207.shortDescription: Introduces modern movement alongside ballet fundamentals—students explore fluid movement, expressive pathways and basic contemporary techniques in a supportive setting.

1088205.shortDescription: An advanced contemporary class where dancers refine technique, expressive movement quality, floor work and artistic interpretation alongside dynamic choreography.

1088208.shortDescription: Focused conditioning class designed to lengthen muscles, improve core strength, increase range of motion and support better performance in all dance styles.

1088218.shortDescription: Focused conditioning class designed to lengthen muscles, improve core strength, increase range of motion and support better performance in all dance styles.

1088203.shortDescription: Students go past basics into more complex grooves, combinations, rhythm development and performance-driven choreography in a high-energy urban style.

1088036.shortDescription: Gives dancers the chance to learn strong jazz technique—kicks, turns and leaps—alongside lyrical movement that emphasizes musicality, expression and fluidity.

1088216.shortDescription: Advances students into more technical jazz combinations, greater leaps and turns, and lyrical choreography that explores emotion and musical response in movement.

1088217.shortDescription: Challenges dancers with sophisticated jazz technique and expressive lyrical routines that demand control, artistry and performance presence.

1121457.shortDescription: A fun introductory hip-hop class designed for younger dancers, combining age-appropriate urban dance moves, rhythm, teamwork and creative expression.

1088226.shortDescription: A joyful, recreational enrichment class for our youngest dancers—blending music learning numbers and letters, dance games, basic steps and imaginative play to spark confidence and a love of movement.

1088228.shortDescription: A joyful, recreational enrichment class for our youngest dancers—blending music learning numbers and letters, dance games, basic steps and imaginative play to spark confidence and a love of movement.

1088230.shortDescription: A joyful, recreational enrichment class for our youngest dancers—blending music learning numbers and letters, dance games, basic steps and imaginative play to spark confidence and a love of movement.

1101824.shortDescription: Peewee Acrobatics introduces younger dancers to tumbling skills integrated with dance—cartwheels, handstands, basic backbends and beginning acro technique in a positive group setting.

1088186.shortDescription: A high-energy, age-appropriate hip-hop class where little dancers learn fun urban moves, rhythm, coordination and confidence in a creative and inclusive environment.

1101831.shortDescription: MUST BE PRE-QUALIFIED: Provides targeted training for advanced ballet dancers ready to work on pointe shoes—building strength, alignment, ankle/foot preparation and artistry to dance ‘en pointe’ safely and confidently.

1088048.shortDescription: MUST BE PRE-QUALIFIED: Provides targeted training for advanced ballet dancers ready to work on pointe shoes—building strength, alignment, ankle/foot preparation and artistry to dance ‘en pointe’ safely and confidently.

1088191.shortDescription: A preparatory class for dancers readying for pointe—enhancing foot and ankle strength, refining classical ballet technique and ensuring proper readiness for pointe work.

1121458.shortDescription: Welcomes adult dancers of all levels to learn tap technique, rhythm, coordination and fun, offering a welcoming environment to explore tap dance and make movement connections.

1088211.shortDescription: Gives dancers a chance to refine their rhythm tap vocabulary, build coordination and musicality and perform routines with increased technical and performance demands.

1088220.shortDescription: A hybrid class where dancers rotate through tap, ballet and jazz technique—building versatility, coordination and foundational skills across multiple dance genres.

1088224.shortDescription: Combines three disciplines—tap dance, classical ballet and tumbling skills—giving motivated students the chance to build coordination, strength and multi-style versatility.

1088033.shortDescription: Combines three disciplines—tap dance, classical ballet and tumbling skills—giving motivated students the chance to build coordination, strength and multi-style versatility.

1088204.shortDescription: Combines three disciplines—tap dance, classical ballet and tumbling skills—giving motivated students the chance to build coordination, strength and multi-style versatility.

1088199.shortDescription: A performance-oriented class aimed at dancers focused on jumps, leaps, turns and advanced technique that support competitive teams and choreography demands.

1088187.shortDescription: Pushes dancers to refine advanced jumps, turns and technical transitions, building the dynamic movement quality needed for higher-level performance and team work.
